original_text: the bases for the surrounding courtyard and those for its entrance and all the tent pegs for the tabernacle and those for the surrounding courtyard.
korean_text: 뜰 주위의 기둥 받침과 그 휘장 문의 기둥 받침이며 성막의 모든 말뚝과 뜰 주위의 모든 말뚝을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: the bases for the surrounding courtyard
and all the tent pegs for the tabernacle
and those for the surrounding courtyard
